name: Spaghetti Bolognese
method:
1. Cook spaghetti according to package directions.
2. In a large skillet, cook ground beef and onion over medium heat until beef is no longer pink.
3. Add crushed tomatoes and garlic. Simmer for 10-15 minutes.
4. Serve sauce over cooked spaghetti.

name: Chicken Fajitas
method:
1. Cut chicken into thin strips.
2. In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium-high heat.
3. Add chicken and cook until no longer pink.
4. Add peppers and onion. Cook until vegetables are tender.
5. Serve in tortillas.

name: Beef Stir-Fry
method:
1. In a large skillet or wok, heat oil over high heat.
2. Add steak and stir-fry until browned.
3. Add peppers, onion, and garlic. Stir-fry until vegetables are tender.
4. Serve over rice.

name: Tomato Soup
method:
1. In a large pot, sauté onion and garlic in butter until onion is translucent.
2. Add tomatoes (with juice) and bring to a boil.
3. Reduce heat and simmer for 10-15 minutes.
4. In a small bowl, whisk together flour and 1/2 cup water until smooth. Slowly pour into soup, stirring constantly. Simmer for an additional 5 minutes or until thickened.
5. Serve with crusty bread.

name: Beef Stroganoff
method:
1. In a large skillet, melt butter over medium-high heat.
2. Add beef and onion. Cook until beef is browned and onion is translucent.
3. Add mushrooms and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes.
4. Remove skillet from heat and stir in sour cream.
5. Serve over egg noodles.
